name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer skilled in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **Express**, and **Nest.js** for building robust backend systems. Expert in containerization and orchestration using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, with a strong emphasis on CI/CD practices leveraging **Jenkins** and **GitHub Actions**. Proficient in infrastructure as code (IaC) with **Terraform**, ensuring scalable and reliable application deployment. Experienced in creating RESTful services with **OpenAPI** and **Swagger**, while adhering to design principles like **SOLID** and **DDD**. Committed to security best practices including **OAuth2**, **OIDC**, and **JWT**. Proven track record in delivering complex solutions across diverse industries like healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, recognized for enhancing system performance through automation and efficient architecture.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and maintained **RESTful APIs** using **Java (Spring Boot)**, achieving **40% enhancement** in data accuracy and enabling secure integration with **OAuth2** and **Spring Security**.
• Designed a microservices architecture for the Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), leading to **95% accuracy** in patient tracking and improved adherence rates through automated reminders.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, which resulted in a **80% reduction** in deployment times.
• Containerized applications using **Docker** and orchestrated services on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)**, maintaining **99.9% uptime** and streamlining production deployments.
• Enhanced user experience and interface design for applications with **React** and **Ant Design**, which cut down task completion time by **30%**.
• Built an efficient notification system with **RabbitMQ**, ensuring **99% timely delivery** of alerts to users.
• Executed Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with **Terraform**, optimizing cloud resource management and enhancing overall system performance.
• Collaborated in an Agile development environment using **Scrum** and **Kanban** methodologies to facilitate project progress and team productivity.

Utilized **Java** and **Spring Boot** to develop robust backend services, resulting in a **25%** reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
Implemented real-time notifications using **Kafka**, achieving a timely notification rate of **98%** for critical issues.
Designed and developed a customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, enhancing resolution rates by **20%**.
Streamlined testing and deployment processes using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a reliable and efficient release management cycle.
Executed deployment strategies on **AWS EC2** leveraging **Docker** and **Terraform**, decreasing infrastructure setup time by **50%**.

• Developed and maintained **REST APIs** utilizing **Java (Spring Boot)**, leading to a **98% uptime** with architectural adherence to **SOLID** principles.
• Implemented secure authentication and authorization protocols using **OAuth2** and **JWT** to enhance data protection.
• Led the development of a microservices architecture with **Node.js** and **Express**, achieving deployment scalability across **6 regions** through **Docker** and **Kubernetes**.
• Enhanced CI/CD pipelines through **Jenkins** and **GitHub Actions**, ensuring smoother deployments with a **30% reduction** in deployment failures.
• Collaborated on frontend development using **TypeScript** and **React**, improving user experience and performance with a reduction in load times by **40%** through effective code optimization.
• Employed **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code (IaC), resulting in quicker environment provisioning and configuration management.
• Engaged in **Agile** methodologies (Scrum and Kanban) to iterate on development processes, improving team responsiveness by **25%**.

skills:

	Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

**Backend Frameworks**
	Spring Boot, Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js, Spring Security, Hibernate, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	REST, OpenAPI, Swagger, OAuth2, OIDC, JWT, OWASP

	AWS Lambda

	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

**Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

	Microservices, RESTful API design, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), SOLID, DDD, Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, Kanban
